title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 36 - Debt Statement Form To Be Used In Connection With Public Sales Of Bonds By School Districts Outside Of Cities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 36 - Debt Statement Form To Be Used In Connection With Public Sales Of Bonds By School Districts Outside Of Cities

State Regulations
§ 36.1 - Form of statement
§ 36.2 - Effective date

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 36

Statutory authority: Local Finance Law, §
141.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
